definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Men, brethren, and fathers, hear ye my defence which I make now unto you.
sentences.chinese: 諸位父兄請聽，我現在對你們分訴。

sentences.english: Chinese is not my mother tongue, so if I've written something wrong or offended someone, I wish all of you could excuse me.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有什麼寫錯或者有得罪的地方，請諸位別見笑。

sentences.english: It will perhaps interest you to hear the story of that pavillion.
sentences.chinese: 諸位或許有興趣聽聽這古蹟的故事。

sentences.english: We hope you will contribute unstintingly to the Gum my Bears Overtime Fund.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望諸位爲“小熊糖加班基金”慷慨解囊。

sentences.english: Rehearsals, as you see, are under way, for a new production of Chalumeau's "Hannibal".
sentences.chinese: 諸位請看，我們正在彩排夏盧莫的新劇《漢尼拔》。

sentences.english: Thank you all for coming this morning.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝諸位今天上午來到這裏。

sentences.english: I think you and your family are about to burst out with joy over your big promotion.
sentences.chinese: 我想您和府上諸位，都會爲您的大升遷而極度歡樂。

sentences.english: Folks, they’re all one war with different fronts.
sentences.chinese: 諸位，這都是一場戰爭的不同前線。

sentences.english: Thank you all for being here tonight to share this historic moment.
sentences.chinese: 感謝諸位今晚在此與我們共享這一歷史時刻。

sentences.english: That is all I have to say to you.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我要告訴諸位的一切。

sentences.english: It truly is an honor for me to be here with you today.
sentences.chinese: 今天能與諸位共聚一堂實在是我的榮幸。

sentences.english: Brothers and fathers, listen now to my defense.
sentences.chinese: 諸位父兄請聽，我現在對你們分訴。
謝謝大家，祝賀你們，願諸位一切平安。

sentences.english: Ladies or gentlemen, I give you we talker to tonight.
sentences.chinese: 女士們，男士們，讓我向諸位介紹今晚的朗誦者。

sentences.english: ITAR-TASS would be pleased to support this initiative in the most active way.
sentences.chinese: 請諸位相信，俄塔社將以最積極的態度對此給予支持。

sentences.english: I'd like to introduce Mr. Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 我願向諸位介紹張先生。

definition: (of an area) vast or extensive/large-scale/widespread/(of people) numerous
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
